comment: Inke maa baap ka to kya kahein.... History ki books bhi sharmaaa jayein..
amr:
# ::snt Inke maa baap ka to kya kahein.... History ki books bhi sharmaaa jayein..
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (ii / inke
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (b / baap))
            :op2 (ii2 / inke
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (b2 / baap))
            :op3 (k / kya
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (k2 / kahein)))
      :snt2 (b3 / book
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "History"
                  :op2 " ki"
                  :op3 "Books")
            :mod (b4 / bhi
                  :mode expressive
                  :mod (s / sharmaaa
                        :mod (j / jayein)))))

comment: After listening to her I thought she may be aware who is her mother, but I doubt she may not be aware of her biological father.
amr:
# ::snt After listening to her I thought she may be aware who is her mother, but I doubt she may not be aware of her biological father.
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (r / realize-01
                        :ARG0 (s / she)
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 s
                                    :ARG2 (m / mother)))))
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (l / listen-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 s)))
      :ARG2 (d / doubt-01
            :ARG0 ii
            :ARG1 (p3 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (r2 / realize-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 s
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 s
                                    :ARG2 (f / father))
                              :mod (b / biology))))))
